entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 07:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this morning then southwest 40 late this afternoon except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers early this evening and 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023
